I\'m the hand tool. With me you can move your picture around.
I\'m the zoom tool. With me you can zoom in and out of your picture. Just swipe your finger up or down.
I\'m the paint brush tool. With me you can draw onto your picture.
I\'m the eyedropper tool. With me you can select a color on your picture.
I\'m the magic wand tool. I can change any color in the picture that you tap on to your currently selected color.
I\'m the undo arrow. I can make your recent actions undone.
I\'m the redo arrow. I can restore your recent undos.
I\'m the file manager. I can load, save and create a new picture.
I\'m the color picker. With me you can choose any color you want.
I\'m the stroke and shape picker. I let you select the size and shape of your brush.
I\'m the stamp tool. With me you can copy and paste parts of your picture. Move and resize the rectangle and tap to use the stamp.
I\'m the center point tool. I let you select the center of your picture. This is useful if you want to use your picture with Catroid later on.
